description.value:
Special: Blast (10)

Note: Anyone in blast range must make +0 Toughness Test, suffering one fatigue per degree of failiure. If fail by 5 degrees or more, begin to suffocate. Gas in grenade may linger for some time, causing those in area to repeat test.

system.notes: Anyone in blast range must make +0 Toughness Test, suffering one fatigue per degree of failiure. If fail by 5 degrees or more, begin to suffocate. Gas in grenade may linger for some time, causing those in area to repeat test.
